aima.core.logic.fol.inference

Class Paramodulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.logic.fol.inference.AbstractModulation
      • aima.core.logic.fol.inference.Paramodulation

  • public class Paramodulation
extends AbstractModulation
    Artificial Intelligence A Modern Approach (3r Edition): page 354.

    Paramodulation: For any terms x, y, and z, where z appears somewhere in literal mi, and where UNIFY(x,z) = θ,
                              l1 OR ... OR lk OR x=y,     m1 OR ... OR mn
     ------------------------------------------------------------------------
     SUB(SUBST(θ,x), SUBST(θ,y), SUBST(θ, l1 OR ... OR lk OR m1 OR ... OR mn))
    Paramodulation yields a complete inference procedure for first-order logic with equality.
    Author:
    Ciaran O'Reilly
